message:
`SingleProducerConstrainted` is just optimization to the code, to leverage the fact that we can guarantee a 100% that we will be inserting items in the action block from a single thread at a time. Changing it to `false` makes no difference to the end result (read below if you'll be changing the code).

If you won't be modifying the code to flood the dataflow action block from 2 threads concurrently at the same time, then you can leave it to be `true`, otherwise feel free to change it to `false` for testing purposes, or if you want to go down the multi-threaded path.
